archimate:DataObject.name: SecVulnerabilityScoringMetricDefn
archimate:DataObject.documentation: The definition of a metric which may be categorized into three groups (Base; Temporal; and Environmental). These three groups are further decomposed into groupings for exploitability and/or impact which define metrics used to score vulnerability severity. Notes: For example; Base Metrics are grouped into Base Exploitability and Base Impact Metrics. Base Exploitability Metrics include Access Vector; Authentication; and Access Complexity Metrics.
